item.title: Street & pavement needs cleaning, 27th December
item.description:

item.title: Large tree fallen over pavement so no access for prams or disabled residents, 27th December
item.description:
Tree fallen across whole of public pavement on Wednesday 24/12 and has not been removed as yet . Although it’s Xmas holidays , this is a dangerous hazard for residents and branches could easily be moved into the road by the wind we have experienced. Needs to be removed before colder weather occurs because it will be come slippery !

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mcleod Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish on Church Walk, 27th December
item.description:
Excess rubbish in Church Walk just past the church including a paper bag of trash, broken glass, dog waste bags, etc. Please come address it. This is a recurring issue and it would be helpful to have a permanent bin at the entrance to Church Walk. Thanks

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Church Walk, Hackney, London
